game.name: Gold Miner Jack
game.description:
Someone told Jack that gold mining can be a nice alternative to be rich. So he has decided to perform the job of a gold miner. However, this is a first time when he is going to attempt this job. Would you like to guide him to aim for the gold? Join Gold Miner Jack and be prepared to help him to grab as much gold as possible while avoiding the stones, skeletons and other useless things! This mine is full of gold, diamonds and other treasures.

Your objective in this brand new adventure game is to help Jack grab gold, jewels and secret bags before time runs out. Hey! The more gold or other treasure you grab; the more dollars you would be able to earn. Common friends! You have the guts to show him the path of digging out the maximum gold to be the richer man of this planet. You can purchase new upgrades with the money you earn from the store.

There are 20 funny and engaging levels combined with amazing gameplay and easy controls in this highly addictive and challenging mining game. Try to get grab the maximum gold possible to get the highest possible score to be on the top of the leaderboards! The best part is that every level is designed with a particular scoring requirement. Pass the present level and reach the advanced one to achieve the necessary number of points! Good luck to have a blast in arcade mining games!
